title: Friend can't get into account?
body: Okay so my friend who hasn't played League in prolly about a year wanted to play again after his break. He remembers his password but it won't let him on his account. He never gave it to anyone and there haven't been any games played on it since. Did Riot do a password reset or something? We can't figure out what happened.

replies.body: The best way to help your friend with his account would be through our [**Account Recovery Form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416). Through his ticket, we'll be able to go over all his account information and help him get back on the Rift!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=vA9Ygb2l,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-03-27T03:29:09.001+0000)
>
> The best way to help your friend with his account would be through our [**Account Recovery Form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416). Through his ticket, we'll be able to go over all his account information and help him get back on the Rift!

54367

I'm having the same issue as his friend I think.  why can't I get in.

Are those number some sort of error code you're seeing?

If you're also having issues logging in, your best bet would be to reach out to us through our [Account Recovery Form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) too!
